name: amnesiac-monorepo
description: Amnesiac - Blood on the Clocktower PWA and Session Management API

scripts.build:all: bun run build:web && bun run build:server
scripts.lint: cd apps/web && bun run lint && cd ../server && bun run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd apps/web && bun run lint:fix && cd ../server && bun run lint:fix
scripts.test: cd apps/web && bun run test && cd ../server && bun run test
scripts.clean: rm -rf apps/*/node_modules apps/*/dist packages/*/node_modules packages/*/dist node_modules

author: AbstractDevs
